commit message: Merge branch 'master' into develop
Moving some strings in WPStatsTrackerMixpanel to constants.

Moving the tracking of 'Application Opened' people property.

Was previously tracking this on initialization of Mixpanel but shifted
this to it's proper place along side the Application Opened event.

remove Config.java generation, use BuildConfig.java instead

Use a custom implementation of HttpStack that internally initializes SelfSignedSSLCertsManager in a secondary thread. All connections that need to use the SelfSignedSSLCertsManager will wait till the initialization is completed. (few secs).
